document_data.name: Bugman's Mug
document_data.refs2e: {{cite dragon/163/Hedge Wizards|22}}{{cite book/Wizard's Spell Compendium Volume One|112-113}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bugman's mug''''' was a spell developed by [[Bugman]] to combat hangovers.
document_data.Effects: The spell converted the water inside a [[pewter]] [[mug]] into a [[potion]] that suppressed hangovers, drunkenness, and most other alcohol-related impairments if imbibed within the duration. The duration was dependent on the caster's experience: it would almost certainly last two minutes at least.
document_data.Components: Besides [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, the potion required common water as the [[material component]], served in a pewter mug.
document_data.History: The spell was developed by [[Bugman]] for a [[dwarven]] friend of his. It was a rare spell, barely known outside of hedge mages.
